# DateTimeHelper.FromUnixTimeStamp method

Returns a DateTime from the milliseconds since '1/1/1970' (Unix Time).

```csharp
public static DateTime FromUnixTimeStamp(double milliseconds)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| milliseconds | Milliseconds value |

## Return Value

A DateTime that represents the date.
